ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_Kramer_50_Magnum_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kramer .50 Magnum
ThingDef.description: The Kramer .50 Magnum was a handgun manufactured by Kramer Metallarbeiten GmBH and used by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and the Office of the Colonial Marshals during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_Kramer_Short-Barrel_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Kramer Short-Barrel
ThingDef.description: The Kramer Short-Barrel was a hand-held riot gun built under license by Armat Battlefield Systems. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_L56A3_Smartgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona L56A3 Smartgun
ThingDef.description: The Weyland-Yutani Corporation L56A3 Smartgun was a variant of Armat Battlefield Systems' M56 Smartgun. It was notably employed by the Three World Empire and the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M10_Auto_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M10 Auto Pistol
ThingDef.description: The M10 Auto Pistol was a machine pistol manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and the United Americas Aerospace Force during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M37A3_Pump_Shotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M37A3 Pump Shotgun
ThingDef.description: An ancient design of shotgun that emits a tight-packed spray of pellets. Deadly, but short range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M39_Submachine_Gun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M39 Submachine Gun
ThingDef.description: The Armat Battlefield Systems M39 Submachine Gun, also known as the SMA7, was a submachine gun chambered for 10mm caseless ammunition. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps, United Americas and Three World Empire during the late 22nd century, and became one of the most successful Armat weapon after the M41A Pulse Rifle.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M41A3_Burst_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M41A3 Burst Rifle
ThingDef.description: The M41A3 Burst Rifle was a pulse action rifle manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems and a variant of the M41A Pulse Rifle. It was used by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and United Americas during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M41E4_Heavy_Pulse_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M41E4 Heavy Pulse Rifle
ThingDef.description: The Armat Battlefield Systems M41E4 Heavy Pulse Rifle was an American-made pulse-action heavy machine gun variant of the M41A Pulse Rifle. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M42A3_Sniper_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M42A3 Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: The M42A3 Sniper Rifle was a sniper rifle manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. It was derived from the M42A2 Scout Rifle and the successor of the M42A Scope Rifle, and was used by the United States Colonial Marine Corps, the Colonial Marines Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance Service, and the United Americas during the 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M51_Breaching_Scattergun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M51 Breaching Scattergun
ThingDef.description: The M51 Breaching Scattergun, initially known as the Model 1771 Cobra Max Tactical, was a tactical/riot shotgun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems and used by the Office of the Colonial Marshals and the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_M94_Impact_Grenade_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M94 Impact Grenade
ThingDef.description: The Armat Battlefield Systems M94 Impact Grenade was a grenade launcher chambered for M40 HEDP Grenades. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and the Office of the Colonial Marshals during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_Mark_7_Mod_2_CQB_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Mark 7 Mod 2 CQB Pistol
ThingDef.description: The Armat Battlefield Systems Mark 7 Mod 2 CQB Pistol, alternately referred as the Mark 7, was an American-made close-quarter battle machine pistol. It was notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and United Americas Aerospace Force during the 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_X43_Barrage_Flechette_SMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona X43 Barrage Flechette SMG
ThingDef.description: The X43 Barrage Flechette SMG, alternately referred to as the Barrage, was an experimental submachine gun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. It was notably employed by the Colonial Marines Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance Service and the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: AlinesFT_X46_Ballista_Flechette_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona X46 Ballista Flechette
ThingDef.description: The X46 Ballista Flechette, alternately referred to as the Ballista, was an experimental sniper rifle manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems and used by the Colonial Marines Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance Service and the United States Colonial Marine Corps during the late 22nd century.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
